title: Which lines did Lataji sing in the song man kyu bekha? - Quora

response.answer_text: This song from movie Utsav is very special, Its the song sung by Mangeshkar Sisters (Lata and Asha) as a duet together during recording. Ashaji shared a very beautiful incident about this song… when Lataji and Ashaji prepared for the song under Laxmikant Pyarelal (the Music Directors), the practise went ok and they did the take. On the take Lataji surprised Ashaji by singing the prelude of the song where she hums… Ashaji got lost listening to her sister humming in such delightful way and stopped for few seconds, forgot singing her line. They did the retake and this time Ashaji sang her lines but with immense pride and admiration for her big sister.
